programme.title: Roland Garros Classic Match HL

programme.desc: WTA 1000 Highlights - Mutua Madrid Open Final: Aryna Sabalenka vs Coco Gauff. A third Madrid crown tied the tournament record, 9th WTA 1000 and 20th career title, first since Serena to win Miami and Madrid same year.

programme.title: #WhatAYear: WTA1000 ItalianOpen Final

programme.title: #WhatAYear: (W) Cincinnati Open Final

programme.title: The Purpose
programme.desc: Documentary. We feature the stories of people with extraordinary abilities. Over the course of the runtime we get to know Martí, Jan, Konny, Alejandra, Daniel and Michal who participated in the 2024 edition of the race.

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Ronaldinho
programme.desc: Ronaldinho. Ronaldinhos finest Clásico came on the 19th of November of 2005. Just one point separated both teams in the table, but the Brazilian proved that the gulf on the pitch was much greater.

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Andres Iniesta
programme.desc: Andres Iniesta. Andres Iniesta Luján. A normal person that was capable of the extraordinary. A glorious career which was also built, in part, on magical performances in ElClásico.

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: James Rodríguez

programme.title: El Clasico Moments: BAR v RMA 18/19
programme.desc: El Clasico Moments - Barcelona vs Real Madrid 2018/19. A celebration of footballs fiercest rivalry, El Clásico. From stunning goals to unforgettable drama, we revisit the clashes that defined generations and shaped legends.

programme.title: El Clasico Moments: BAR v RMA 21/22
programme.desc: El Clasico Moments - Barcelona vs Real Madrid 2021/22. A celebration of footballs fiercest rivalry, El Clásico. From stunning goals to unforgettable drama, we revisit the clashes that defined generations and shaped legends.

programme.title: El Clasico Moments: BAR v RMA 08/09
programme.desc: El Clasico Moments - Barcelona vs Real Madrid 2008/09. A celebration of footballs fiercest rivalry, El Clásico. From stunning goals to unforgettable drama, we revisit the clashes that defined generations and shaped legends.

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Ousmane Dembele
programme.desc: Ousmane Dembele. During his spell at Barcelona, Ousmane Dembele took part in six LaLiga Clásicos - nine in total - with a record of five wins and four defeats. But two of these fixtures will probably stand out above the rest.

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Álvaro Arbeloa
programme.desc: Álvaro Arbeloa. Álvaro Arbeloa played a key role in Clásicos, where he was handed the unenviable task of defending the likes of Leo Messi, Neymar Jr, Alexis Sánchez or David Villa down his flank.

programme.title: El Clasico Legends: Gareth Bale
programme.desc: Gareth Bale. Gareth Bale played in LaLiga 11 Clásicos and 15 in total. And despite his numbers against Barcelona not being spectacular, he did score a memorable goal in the 2014 Copa del Rey final.

programme.title: LALIGA: ElClásico The Movie
programme.desc: ElClásico The Movie. The latest edition of Europes biggest grudge match takes place on the biggest stage.

programme.title: LaLiga HL 21/22: Barcelona v R Madrid
programme.desc: LaLiga Santander Highlights - Matchday 10: Barcelona vs Real Madrid. A tense El Clásico packed with chances and bold play saw Real Madrid edge a determined Barcelona, showcasing intensity and high stakes that define this iconic fixture.

programme.title: LaLiga HL 21/22: R Madrid v Barcelona
programme.desc: LaLiga Santander Highlights - Matchday 29: Real Madrid vs Barcelona. Barcelona delivered a stunning 4-0 win at the Bernabeu, with Aubameyang leading a dominant display that marked a turning point under Xavi and silenced all doubts.

programme.title: LaLiga HL 22/23: R Madrid v Barcelona
programme.desc: LaLiga Santander Highlights - Matchday 9: Real Madrid vs Barcelona. Real Madrid beat Barcelona 3-1 at the Bernabeu, taking control early and sealing the win with a late penalty, handing Barça their first league loss of the season.

programme.title: LaLiga HL 22/23: Barcelona v R Madrid
programme.desc: LaLiga Santander Highlights - Matchday 26: Barcelona vs Real Madrid. In a high-paced Clásico at Camp Nou, Barcelona came from behind to win 2-1, with Kessie netting a dramatic injury-time winner after Asensios goal was ruled offside.

programme.title: LaLiga HL 23/24: Barcelona v R Madrid
programme.desc: LaLiga EA Sports Highlights - Matchday 11: Barcelona vs Real Madrid. Barcelona took an early lead, but Jude Bellinghams late double turned the tide as Real Madrid snatched a dramatic Clásico win.

programme.title: LaLiga HL 23/24: R Madrid v Barcelona
programme.desc: LaLiga EA Sports Highlights - Matchday 32: Real Madrid vs Barcelona. Barcelona twice took the lead in a tense Clásico, but Real Madrid responded each time and sealed the win with a late strike from Bellingham.
